products.title: Splash Rose Gold Roller Blind
products.description: Splash rose gold is a beautiful colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder great for injecting colour into any room. products.title: Splash Flamingo

products.title: Splash Flamingo Pink Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash flamingo pink panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The bold pink panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make.
